attributes.action: increase the promotion and education of each Home Nation's history, culture and how they intertwined to become the United Kingdom; to dissipate the Anglo-centric view of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Compared to the 18th and 19th century, when the unification of Scotland and England was celebrated by many on both sides of the border; presently there is undoubtedly a mis-conception in all nations that Britain and all things pertaining to British culture are predominantly English. This causes considerable animosity and alienation both in England and in Scotland and Wales. In addition, when Scotland is mentioned, Northern Ireland and Wales take a back seat to both. All four member nations need to feel a sense of equal importance for our great state to continue.
